channel.title: TRISO-X Fab. Part 70
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: 06/29/2023 The NRC staff plans to hold a partial open and closed (i.e., security and proprietary) meeting to discuss a set of draft requests for additional information (RAIs) to support the TRISO-X license application review.
item.author: NRC/NMSS
